description: Fantasy Football app, whose api also serves the latest player news, statuses, practice updates, and aggregate stats about which players are trending on their platform.
label: Sleeper
name: sleeper

settings.name: sport
settings.label: Sport
settings.description: Professional sport league, ie nfl, nba, etc

settings.name: league_id
settings.label: League ID
settings.description: Unique identifier for the sleeper league

settings.name: trending_players_lookback_hours
settings.label: Trending Player Lookback Hours
settings.description: Total hours to lookback when requesting the current trending players

settings.name: trending_players_limit
settings.label: Trending Players Limit
settings.description: Total number of players to return when requesting the current trending players
